RegisterPage.agreedToS: I have read and agreed to Terms of Service
RegisterPage.placeHolderUserNameShared: Name of the group that has access to the account
RegisterPage.alreadyHaveAccount: If you already have an account, <link>you can log in here.</link>

validate.tos: You must agree to the terms of use
validate.password: Password must be at least 8 characters long

auth/register.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm your account.

auth/check-username.error: User name could not be checked because of a server error.
